practice_phrases.target: I'm not going to remember easily.

practice_phrases.known: 我不能轻易记住这个词。
practice_phrases.target: I can't remember this word easily.

practice_phrases.known: 我猜我不会轻易学会的。
practice_phrases.target: I guess I'm not going to learn easily.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我在学习，所以我不能轻易记住。
practice_phrases.target: Because I'm learning, I can't remember easily.

practice_phrases.known: 我不确定我能不能轻易说英语。
practice_phrases.target: I'm not sure if I can speak English easily.

practice_phrases.known: 我不会轻易记住怎么用英语说的。
practice_phrases.target: I'm not going to remember how to say it in English easily.
